openings.title: Sous Chef
openings.description: We are looking for an experienced and passionate Sous Chef to support our Head Chef in a busy kitchen environment. You will be a key part of our culinary team.
requirements: Minimum 3 years of experience in a similar role.
Excellent cooking skills and knowledge of various techniques.
Ability to work well under pressure.

openings.title: Pastry Chef
openings.description: Join our team as a creative Pastry Chef. You will be responsible for creating a range of delectable desserts, pastries, and breads.
requirements: Proven experience as a Pastry Chef or similar role.
Creative and artistic with an eye for detail.
In-depth knowledge of sanitation principles and food preparation.
Certificate in culinary arts, pastry-making, or baking is a plus.

openings.title: Server / Waitstaff
openings.description: We are seeking friendly and professional servers to provide an exceptional dining experience to our guests. Full-time and part-time positions available.
requirements: Previous experience as a server is preferred.
Excellent customer service and communication skills.
Knowledge of food and beverage pairings.
A positive attitude and ability to work in a team.

openings.title: Host / Hostess
openings.description: Be the first point of contact for our guests. We're looking for a welcoming and organized Host/Hostess to manage reservations and seating.
requirements: Experience with reservation software is a plus.
Ability to handle a fast-paced environment with a smile.
